thread.title: Kamal Haasan appointed trustee of Nadigar Sangam
thread.title_full: Kamal Haasan appointed trustee of Nadigar Sangam - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Kamal Haasan appointed trustee of Nadigar Sangam
text:
The newly elected office bearers of the Nadigar Sangam, headed by the Nasser, President of Nadigar Sangam, held their first press conference on Sunday. During the meeting, Vishal, the new General Secretary announced that Kamal Haasan would be one of the nine trustees of the Nadigar Sangam, which is supposed to have three trustees in general body and three trustees in executive body, apart from the President, Secretary and Treasurer.
Also, Vishal stated that the first task of the Nadigar Sangam would be to look into the land deal with SPI Cinemas and build a state-of-the-art building for the Nadigar Sangam. Karthi, the new Treasurer of Nadigar Sangam said that their first agenda is to prepare a database for all the three thousand members.
Vishal also said that they were 'Pandavar team' during the election, but not anymore. We will be one big family and work for Nadigar Sangam. He also requested the media not to use the name anymore.
